snippet.title: Project Tower - Official Overview Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into Project Tower and see gameplay, combat, and the alien shapeshifting ability of this upcoming game featuring a mix of genres like third-person shooter, bullet hell, and puzzles. Project Tower is coming to PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store) and PS5 (PlayStation 5) in Q3 2024.


In Project Tower, explore a sci-fi universe, where you play as a human prisoner held in a mysterious alien tower. Your only hope for survival lies in the powerful shapeshifting ability, which allows you to transform into fearsome creatures and emulate their unique skills. Explore the different floors of the tower, face hordes of fearsome enemies, solve complex puzzles and use your arsenal to unlock the secrets of the tower and regain your freedom.
